__e: Well, so she got lonely without me and planned a little trip.
The master has planned... a nice long voyage for you, in honor of your birthday!
It's a very important day for our little princess because today it's her birthday. She planned a big party and invited many friends to celebrate together.
Did you have this in mind from the start?
How do I know that you didn't plan it to make me betray my friends?
The son of a bitch had it all figured out.
But all the rest... was his plot...your husband's.
You bum your way in on board a boat... I spotted you, right from the start!
Not him. This is all planned, that's why they're all here.
It was your father I didn't plan on.
You were planning on them anyway, but this way it's sure.
No, of course you don't, because you planned it like this in the beginning!
He's serious about the way he pulled the job.
What do you want of me?
You chose to marry, planning to kill him.
But that's not what God had planned for me.
Is this what the Good lord meant for us?
Besides, she`s got her heart set on something she planned for us tonight.
He planned the whole thing just like you said.
The person who wanted to snuff out your life, Sir Henry, was the same one who plotted to kill your Uncle.
Look, it was me with the 54-12 Special Group... who'd planned the whole damn thing in the first place.
